text:
Entrepreneur First | Clojure / ClojureScript developer | London | Onsite | EU work VISA required | https://www.joinef.com

Entrepreneur First brings together the world's most ambitious individuals to help them find a co-founder, develop an idea and build a company. You can read why we do this here:

https://medium.com/entrepreneur-first/tech-entrepreneurship-...

We're hiring engineers to help us build tech-enabled networks as we scale the company out globally. EF is the best place to work with startups and scale your ambition, apply to join our team now!

Apply here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/workforef/jobs/952049
